column4: hello all... this is my first time using linux and i do believe i will need your help quite alot... hope its not too much for you...
ok this may sound stupid... but is there an easy way to make xchat look like mirc?
i believe i've used a "ymessenger" on linux in the past
you emulated the windows version using wine or smth like that?
you couldn't find a debian pkg of it?
...and i'm not sure it has the voice feature. Does it?
it does have sound ... at least thats what they tell on yahoo.com
not necessarily. i suspect the ymessenger is outdated
so i just wait for a newer messenger version? :)
nah, you keep looking around for another project
tnx for your help... i found something called gyachi... looks pretty ok
